character
  1. This diacritic is only used in Sanskrit and Prakrit texts. When a visargah comes after k or kh it becomes a [x] similar to the scotish loch.

character
  1. This diacritic is only used in Sanskrit and Prakrit texts. When a visargah comes after p or ph it becomes a [ɸ] similar to the f in fan but made with just the lips without touching the teeth, like blowing air.
